author: Robert Gearty
title: Indiana's coronavirus stay-at-home order leads to criminal charge in drunk driving case
description: An Indiana man has been charged criminally with violating the state’s coronavirus stay at home order after he crashing his pickup and was arrested on a drunk driving charge.
content:
